# MPMediaLibraryAuthorizationStatus.restricted

**Case**

The app may access some of the content in the user’s media library.

## Declaration

```swift
case restricted
```

## Authorization statuses

- **MPMediaLibraryAuthorizationStatus.notDetermined**: The user hasn’t determined whether to authorize the use of their media library.
- **MPMediaLibraryAuthorizationStatus.denied**: The app may not access the items in the user’s media library.
- **MPMediaLibraryAuthorizationStatus.authorized**: Your app may access items in the user’s media library.
